description: --- language: - es datasets: - CoNLL-2002 widget: - text: "Las oficinas de MMG est√°n en Las Rozas." --- # xlm-roberta-large-ner-spanish This model is a XLM-Roberta-large model fine-tuned for Named Entity Recognition (NER) over the Spanish portion of the CoNLL-2002 dataset. Evaluating it over the test subset of this dataset, we get a F1-score of 89.17, being one of the best NER for Spanish available at the moment.
model_explanation_gemini: Fine-tuned XLM-Roberta-large model for Spanish named entity recognition (NER), achieving an 89.17 F1-score on the CoNLL-2002 dataset.
